About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

My name is Shad DeHart, I am a front-end web developer/designer/photographer from Athens, Ohio. I specialize in frontend webdesign, UI/UX and photography I Love Web Design and Photography. And two things I am most passionate about I get to work with everyday. That is such a bonus!!!

Website Design

We don't just create websites (like everyone else does). We create websites that work.

SEO

Effective on-page and off-page SEO to get you ranking in top positions on Google.

Social

Social media growth to improve credibility and gain new clients.
